title: Jay Bilas
description: Jay Bilas has always covered college sports in a way that Katie gravitates towards, so she talked to him about that, and about the effect that player empowerment is already having on the system. They also cover the usual stuff: his kids, his life, and Young Jeezy.
itunes:author: ESPN, Katie Nolan
itunes:subtitle: Jay Bilas talks player empowerment & Young Jeezy
itunes:summary: Jay Bilas has always covered college sports in a way that Katie gravitates towards, so she talked to him about that, and about the effect that player empowerment is already having on the system. They also cover the usual stuff: his kids, his life, and Young Jeezy.
